summary: An event triggered during simulation initialization that checks analysis flags and, when active, overrides key parameters to modify the coverage and quality of emergency obstetric and newborn care (B/CEmONC) or postnatal care for mothers and newborns.
business_intent: Provide a mechanism for conducting scenario analyses by dynamically adjusting care delivery parameters, allowing researchers to assess the impact of different coverage and quality levels on maternal and newborn health outcomes.
